Reviews.Title: PERFECT 1st DSLR
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Avolio
Reviews.Content: I can't think of anything bad to say about this. Cameta Camera has put together the PERFECT kit for this D3200.The camera: GREAT for beginners or advanced users. The menus are super easy to use and the guided menus allow you to let the camera do all the work. It is not heavy and the battery is extremely small compared to other DSLR's. The kit lens is all you need for your basic photography and the extra Tamron lens gives you the ability to test your skills a little bit more.The accessories: I LOVE the book bag. It is small but fits EVERYTHING that comes with the kit. The remote control is something TOTALLY FUN but I haven't used it yet. The SD card is a huge 32GB so you won't run out of room and the lens hoods and uv filters are must haves for any DSLR.

Reviews.Title: New Toy for My Photos
Reviews.Author: Cdawes
Reviews.Content: I love this camera... Im a big Nikon fan. I have the D3100 and trust it is my favorite camera but this one... my gosh i can keep this one for a long time. I dont mind that the d-light is not there but i have my photo editing program so it doesnt bother me much that its not there. I also love the shutter remote heaven. no problems ...yet.. and thats cool for me cuz i have yet to have an issue with my nikon d3100 so lets see this product endurance ..looking forward to long good-times with this one hahaha!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon 3200
Reviews.Author: E Courter
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing cam.  I am finding new features and settings each time I use it.  The lenes and filters work great taking some great family and landscape pics.

Reviews.Title: Great product and fast shipping thank you
Reviews.Author: Jodi Bowdoin
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera that has replaced my d40 the picture come out great. The kit had everything you need will buy from them again thank you.

Reviews.Title: It is great
Reviews.Author: Barry S "Barry S"
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use and the pictures are superb.  I like that I can change the  Everything came as it was described. I like having the option to change the image size.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Hösel
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera very muchIt met my expectationsI would recommend this camera to my freinds and family
